results.title: KingSpec Showcased Latest Gaming Storage and Memory Solutions at CES 2024
results.content: At CES 2024, KingSpec showcased a variety of consumer-grade storage solutions. High-speed Portable SSD-Z5 Z5 Portable SSD features a USB 3.2 Gen2×2 interface for a speedy 20Gbps transfer rate. It ranges from 512GB to 2TB and is housed in a durable metal casing with RGB LED lighting.
results.raw_content:
KingSpec Showcased Latest Gaming Storage and Memory Solutions at CES 2024
The Consumer Electronics Show(CES) was held in Las Vegas, USA, from January 9th to 12th, 2024. Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. showcased consumer and industrial-grade storage and memory solutions at booth 52172 on the second floor of the Venice World Expo Center. During this exhibition, KingSpec has encountered many outstanding industry peers and technical enthusiasts, engaging in discussions about the latest storage solutions and storage trends together.
About CES
CES is a leading global technology exhibition that brings together the latest innovations and technological trends worldwide. During this exhibition, the audience was constantly present, and everyone was excited to browse the exhibits and exchange insights on technological innovation. Here, you can broaden your horizons.
Exhibition Highlight
At CES 2024, KingSpec showcased a variety of consumer-grade storage solutions.
High-speed Portable SSD-Z5
Z5 Portable SSD features a USB 3.2 Gen2Ã—2 interface for a speedy 20Gbps transfer rate. It ranges from 512GB to 2TB and is housed in a durable metal casing with RGB LED lighting. The Type-C interface ensures versatility, making it compatible with PCs, laptops, and smartphones like the Vivo X Fold and Galaxy series. This lightweight, portable SSD can capture and store anytime and anywhere, saving time and effort.
Cool DDR4 RGB- Silver X
KingSpec released the latest DDR4 RGB gaming memory module, Silver X. This module boasts a frequency of up to 3600MHz and a capacity of up to 32GB. The Silver X seamlessly merges a sophisticated silver design with robust features and cool RGB LED lights, promising to elevate your computing experience to unprecedented levels.
Upcoming New Release- M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230 SSD
KingSpec also showcased our upcoming new product, M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230 SSD, at this exhibition. This eagerly anticipated product is set to be released soon. To get a sneak peek, please get in touch with us or follow our official website to gain the latest information.
About KingSpec
Established in 2007, KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. is a global storage and memory solutionsÂ provider. With brands like KingSpec and YANSENÂ adhering to ISO 9001 quality standards, we offer a range of products,Â including SSDs, DDR RAM, memory cards, hub enclosures, USB drives, and storage accessories. The independent R&D team and manufacturing capabilities enable us to provide customized storage solutions globally, successfully entering markets in Europe, North and South America, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, and East Asia.

KingSpec Set to Showcase Latest Storage and Memory at CES 2024
As the world eagerly awaits the 2024 International CES, the global stage for innovative consumer electronics and technology, KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. is gearing up to showcase its latest consumer-grade and industrial-grade storage and memory innovations at Booth 52172 (2nd Floor) in the Venetian Expo Hall, Las Vegas, from January 9-12, 2024. This annual feast, hosted by the Consumer Technology Association (CTA), promises to be an eye-catching display of technological prowess and innovation.
Unveiling KingSpec's Star Products for Exhibition:
1. Z5 Portable SSD: Blazing Speeds and Dazzling Design
The Z5 Portable SSD, ranging from 512GB to 4TB, features USB 3.2 Gen2×2 high-speed transfer capabilities, reaching speeds up to 1850MB/s. Bid farewell to long waits for file transfers—now a matter of seconds. The Z5 boasts 128 dynamic breathing colors inspired by cyberpunk aesthetics, casting a radiant glow on your gaming setup. Encased in a premium Zinc Alloy Enclosure and equipped with a ROBO-style heat sink, the Z5 ensures superior heat dissipation, maintaining optimal performance during extended usage.
With a Type-C interface, the Z5 is compatible with various devices, from PCs and laptops to the latest smartphones. Experience a seamless blend of high-performance storage and striking design with the Z5 Portable SSD.
2. Upcoming New Product DDR4 RGB, Silver X
Experience blazing speeds with the coming new release DDR4 RGB, Siver X. Featuring a frequency of up to 3600MHz for unparalleled performance. Enhance your computing experience with premium 3D NAND Flash, ensuring top-tier performance and smoother operations. The elegant silver heatsink infuses style and enhances thermal efficiency, facilitating effective heat dissipation.
3. CFexpress TypeB 4TB: Unlocking Creative Potential
Choose from a selection of up to 4TB with the CFexpress TypeB memory card, providing clients with ample storage. With impressive read speeds of up to 1900MB/s and write speeds of 1750MB/s, this card ensures smooth, uninterrupted performance. Ideal for stable native 4K/8K video recording, CFexpress TypeB opens up limitless creative possibilities for digital artists.
Designed to be compatible with mainstream camera brands like Nikon Z9/Z 7II/Z 6II/Z7, Canon EOS 1DX MKIII/EOS R5/EOS R5 C, and Panasonic LUMIX GH6/LUMIX DC-S1R, the CFexpress TypeB memory card ensures a seamless fit into various professional setups. Enjoy the flexibility and reliability of this high-performance memory card for your creative endeavors.
About KingSpec
Established in 2007, KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. is a global storage and memory solutions provider. With brands like KingSpec and YANSEN adhering to ISO 9001 quality standards, we offer a range of products, including SSDs, DDR RAM, memory cards, hub enclosures, USB drives, and storage accessories. Our independent R&D team and manufacturing capabilities enable us to provide customized storage solutions globally, successfully entering markets in Europe, North and South America, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, and East Asia.
Visit our official website to explore the limitless possibilities we bring to storage technology. As the CES approaches, get ready to witness the future of electronics with KingSpec at Booth 52172!
Don't miss this chance! Contact us to get the discount code for the expo ticket!
Email: alisazhu@kingspec.com;  WhatsApp: +86 13777898516

KingSpec Showcases Latest Gaming Storage and Memory Solutions at CES 2024
The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2024 is taking place in Las Vegas, USA, from January 9th to 12th. Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. showcases consumer-grade and industrial-grade storage and memory solutions at booth 52172 on the second floor of the Venice Expo Center.
About CES
CES is a leading global technology exhibition that brings together the latest innovations and technological trends worldwide. The audience is constantly present, and everyone is excited to browse the exhibition's exhibits and exchange insights on technological innovation. Here, you can broaden your horizons.
Exhibition Highlight
At CES 2024, KingSpec showcased a variety of consumer-grade storage solutions.
High-speed Portable SSD-Z5
Z5 Portable SSD features a USB 3.2 Gen2×2 interface for a speedy 20Gbps transfer rate. It ranges from 512GB to 2TB and is housed in a durable metal casing with RGB LED lighting. The Type-C interface ensures versatility, making it compatible with PCs, laptops, and smartphones like the Vivo X Fold and Galaxy series. This lightweight, portable SSD can capture and store anytime and anywhere, saving time and effort.
Cool DDR4 RGB- Silver X
KingSpec has released the latest DDR4 RGB gaming memory module, Silver X. This module boasts a frequency of up to 3600MHz and a capacity of up to 32GB. The Silver X seamlessly merges a sophisticated silver design with robust features and cool RGB LED lights, promising to elevate your computing experience to unprecedented levels.
Upcoming New Release- M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230 SSD
At this exhibition, KingSpec also showcases our upcoming new product, M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230 SSD. This eagerly anticipated product is set to be released soon. To get a sneak peek and stay updated, please visit our booth and follow our official website.
We look forward to meeting industry colleagues and technology enthusiasts at the exhibition to explore the latest developments in technology together. Don't miss this opportunity!
About KingSpec
Established in 2007, KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. is a global storage and memory solutions provider. With brands like KingSpec and YANSEN adhering to ISO 9001 quality standards, we offer a range of products, including SSDs, DDR RAM, memory cards, hub enclosures, USB drives, and storage accessories. Our independent R&D team and manufacturing capabilities enable us to provide customized storage solutions globally, successfully entering markets in Europe, North and South America, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, and East Asia.

The Consumer Electronics Show(CES) was held in Las Vegas, USA, from January 9th to 12th, 2024. Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. showcased consumer and industrial-grade storage and memory solutions at booth 52172 on the second floor of the Venice World Expo Center. During this exhibition, KingSpec has encountered many outstanding industry peers and technical enthusiasts, engaging in discussions about the latest storage solutions and storage trends together.
About CES
CES is a leading global technology exhibition that brings together the latest innovations and technological trends worldwide. During this exhibition, the audience was constantly present, and everyone was excited to browse the exhibits and exchange insights on technological innovation. Here, you can broaden your horizons.
Exhibition Highlight
At CES 2024, KingSpec showcased a variety of consumer-grade storage solutions.
High-speed Portable SSD-Z5

The Type-C interface ensures versatility, making it compatible with PCs, laptops, and smartphones like the Vivo X Fold and Galaxy series. results.title: KingSpec - Information and distributors around the world - DirectIndustry
results.content: Established in 2007, Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on developing cutting-edge storage solutions, providing standardized production, oﬀering expert technical support, and delivering customized industrial applications.
results.raw_content:
KingSpec
Who we are
Established in 2007, Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on developing cutting-edge storage solutions, providing standardized production, oﬀering expert technical support, and delivering customized industrial applications. KingSpec has become a renowned global brand in the storage industry and is among the earliest leaders in China.
The company operates two brands: KingSpec (Consumer grade) and YANSEN (Industrial wide temperature grade). KingSpec is a consumer brand that oﬀers storage solutions for personal laptops, desktops, and high-end gaming consoles. YANSEN is a brand concentrated on providing solutions for industrial embedded applications. Both brands oﬀer a variety of storage interfaces and include four product lines: Internal SSD, External SSD, DDR and Memory Card.
KingSpec has an independent R&D team that provides one-stop OEM and ODM solutions for industry customers, from product design to mass-production. The company has provided customized solutions to various industries such as Data Center, Industrial Automation, Surveillance, Transportation, Medical, Financial, and IoT.
Product quality is KingSpec's core competence, and the company has passed ISO9001 quality management systems with strict production management. Plus simulation testing like wide temperature, salt spray, shock & vibration, power loss protection, constant reading and writing is performed. Every product line is internationally certiﬁed with FCC, CE, RoHS, REACH, and WEEE.
Now, we have successfully expanded globally, receiving high praise from strategic partners like CNPC, THTF, Great Wall, and more. As a pioneering manufacturer in the storage industry, KingSpec has been recognized as a "China High-tech Enterprise", "China Little Giant Enterprise", "Shenzhen Well-known Brand", and "Well-known and Excellent Enterprise in Guangdong Province".
Our values
1）Quality: the company has passed ISO9001 quality management systems with strict production management. We prioritize delivering high-quality SSD products from design to mass production, ensuring excellence in design, manufacturing, and performance.
2）Innovation: We constantly push the boundaries of SSD technology through research and development, driving innovation in our solutions and features.
3）Reliability: We understand the critical role our SSDs play and strive to provide durable and consistently reliable.
4）Customer Focus: Customers are at the heart of our operations. We listen, understand, and provide tailored solutions that meet or exceed their expectations.
5）Sustainability: We are committed to environmental responsibility, incorporating eco-friendly practices and responsible waste management in our operations.
6）Collaboration: We actively engage with stakeholders to foster partnerships, driving collective success in the industry.
7）Integrity: We operate with integrity, honesty, and transparency, adhering to ethical business practices and building trust with our customers and partners.
8）Continuous Improvement: We believe in continuous improvement, embracing feedback, monitoring trends, and adopting new technologies to enhance value for our customers.
9）Employee Empowerment: We value our employees as our greatest asset, promoting their growth, development, and empowerment within a supportive environment.
10）Social Responsibility: We actively participate in initiatives that contribute to the betterment of society, supporting community programs and social welfare activities.

KingSpec Showcased Latest Gaming Storage and Memory Solutions at CES 2024
The Consumer Electronics Show(CES) was held in Las Vegas, USA, from January 9th to 12th, 2024. Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. showcased consumer and industrial-grade storage and memory solutions at booth 52172 on the second floor of the Venice World Expo Center. During this exhibition, KingSpec has encountered many outstanding industry peers and technical enthusiasts, engaging in discussions about the latest storage solutions and storage trends together.
About CES
CES is a leading global technology exhibition that brings together the latest innovations and technological trends worldwide. During this exhibition, the audience was constantly present, and everyone was excited to browse the exhibits and exchange insights on technological innovation. Here, you can broaden your horizons.
Exhibition Highlight
At CES 2024, KingSpec showcased a variety of consumer-grade storage solutions.
High-speed Portable SSD-Z5
Z5 Portable SSD features a USB 3.2 Gen2Ã—2 interface for a speedy 20Gbps transfer rate. It ranges from 512GB to 2TB and is housed in a durable metal casing with RGB LED lighting. The Type-C interface ensures versatility, making it compatible with PCs, laptops, and smartphones like the Vivo X Fold and Galaxy series. This lightweight, portable SSD can capture and store anytime and anywhere, saving time and effort.
Cool DDR4 RGB- Silver X
KingSpec released the latest DDR4 RGB gaming memory module, Silver X. This module boasts a frequency of up to 3600MHz and a capacity of up to 32GB. The Silver X seamlessly merges a sophisticated silver design with robust features and cool RGB LED lights, promising to elevate your computing experience to unprecedented levels.
Upcoming New Release- M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230 SSD
KingSpec also showcased our upcoming new product, M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230 SSD, at this exhibition. This eagerly anticipated product is set to be released soon. To get a sneak peek, please get in touch with us or follow our official website to gain the latest information.
About KingSpec
Established in 2007, KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. is a global storage and memory solutionsÂ provider. With brands like KingSpec and YANSENÂ adhering to ISO 9001 quality standards, we offer a range of products,Â including SSDs, DDR RAM, memory cards, hub enclosures, USB drives, and storage accessories. The independent R&D team and manufacturing capabilities enable us to provide customized storage solutions globally, successfully entering markets in Europe, North and South America, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, and East Asia.

KingSpec Präsentiert auf der CES 2024 die neuesten Gaming-Speicher- und Speicherlösungen
Die Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2024 findet vom 9. bis 12. Januar in Las Vegas, USA, statt. Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. präsentiert Speicher- und Speicherlösungen in Verbraucher- und Industriequalität am Stand 52172 im zweiten Stock des Venice Expo Center.
Über die CES
CES ist eine führende globale Technologiemesse, die die neuesten Innovationen und Technologietrends weltweit zusammenbringt. Das Publikum ist ständig anwesend und alle sind gespannt darauf, durch die Ausstellungsstücke zu stöbern und Einblicke in technologische Innovationen auszutauschen. Hier können Sie Ihren Horizont erweitern.
Ausstellungshöhepunkt
Auf der CES 2024 KingSpec präsentierte eine Vielzahl von Speicherlösungen für Endverbraucher.
Tragbare Hochgeschwindigkeits-SSD-Z5
Die tragbare SSD Z5 verfügt über eine USB 3.2 Gen2×2-Schnittstelle für eine schnelle Übertragungsrate von 20 Gbit/s. Es reicht von 512 GB bis 2 TB und ist in einem robusten Metallgehäuse mit RGB-LED-Beleuchtung untergebracht. Die Typ-C-Schnittstelle gewährleistet Vielseitigkeit und macht es mit PCs, Laptops und Smartphones wie der Vivo X Fold- und Galaxy-Serie kompatibel. Mit dieser leichten, tragbaren SSD können Sie jederzeit und überall Aufnahmen machen und speichern, was Zeit und Mühe spart.
Cooles DDR4 RGB – Silver X
KingSpec hat das neueste DDR4-RGB-Gaming-Speichermodul Silver X herausgebracht. Dieses Modul verfügt über eine Frequenz von bis zu 3600 MHz und eine Kapazität von bis zu 32 GB. Der Silver
Kommende neue Version – M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230 SSD
Bei dieser Ausstellung KingSpec stellt außerdem unser kommendes neues Produkt vor, die M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230 SSD. Dieses mit Spannung erwartete Produkt soll bald auf den Markt kommen. Um einen ersten Blick zu werfen und auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, besuchen Sie bitte unseren Stand und folgen Sie unserer offiziellen Website.
Wir freuen uns darauf, Branchenkollegen und Technologiebegeisterte auf der Ausstellung zu treffen, um gemeinsam die neuesten Entwicklungen in der Technologie zu erkunden. Lassen Sie sich diese Gelegenheit nicht entgehen!
Über KingSpec
Gegründet in 2007, KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. ist ein globaler Anbieter von Speicher- und Speicherlösungen. Mit Marken wie KingSpec und YANSEN unter Einhaltung der ISO 9001-Qualitätsstandards bieten wir eine Reihe von Produkten an, darunter SSDs, DDR-RAM, Speicherkarten, Hub-Gehäuse, USB-Laufwerke und Speicherzubehör. Unser unabhängiges F&E-Team und unsere Fertigungskapazitäten ermöglichen es uns, weltweit maßgeschneiderte Speicherlösungen anzubieten und erfolgreich Märkte in Europa, Nord- und Südamerika, Südostasien, dem Nahen Osten und Ostasien zu erschließen.

Future with tradition – made in Germany
Janitza LP is the North American arm of Janitza electronics GmbH, a leading German manufacturer of electrical power monitoring hardware and software. With Janitza solutions, customers can evaluate the quality of power in their facility and take action to reduce energy costs, improve uptime, and make operations more sustainable. Janitza North America LP was established in 2019 and recently opened its US headquarters in Ashburn, Virginia.

DXC Technology Co - Company Profile
Powered by
All the data and insights you need on DXC Technology Co in one report.
DXC Technology Co: Overview
DXC Technology Co (DXC) is an information technology (IT) and consulting services provider. The company’s service portfolio includes analytics, cloud applications, cloud infrastructure, enterprise applications, data security services, IT outsourcing (ITO), and workplace and mobility solutions. Its solutions are primarily focused on minimizing business risks and operational costs for clients. DXC caters to the insurance, healthcare and life sciences, aerospace and defense, consumer and retail, manufacturing and automotive, travel and transportation, hospitality, energy, utilities, oil and gas, technology, media and telecommunications, public, banking, and capital sectors. The company’s operations are spread across various regions including the Americas, Australia, and Europe. DXC is headquartered in Ashburn, Virginia, the US.

results.title: Company Profile - Kingspec
results.content: About KingSpec：Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd. Was establish in2007.KingSpec factory has the abilities of hardware design and development , manufacture and wholesale.Office address：Room 1501-1503, Jinxiuhongdu Building, Bulong Road, Longhua District, Shenzhen, Guangdong，ChinaFactory address：3rd/F, Block 6, Yalitong Tech.Park, N...
results.raw_content:
Internal Storage
Gaming Storage
Memory Card
External Storage
Industries We Serve
Automation
Transportation
AIoT
Surveillance
Medical
Financing
Who We Are
Introduction
Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. was established in 2007. KingSpec factory has the abilities of hardware design and development, manufacture and wholesale. KingSpec has been entitled as “National High-tech Enterprise” by Chinese Governments yearly.
Since 2008, KingSpec has been dedicating time and investments into SSD technology development and upgrade production process. So far, KingSpec company has cooperated with TCL, Great Wall, Emerson, EVOC, AAEON, NEC, SONY, ASUS, Lenovo and other enterprises or institutions.
Product quality has always been Kingspec's frist priority. Every product line Every product line obtained certifications including CE, FCC, RoHS, REACH, KC. The company joined the ASSD (SSD ASSOCIATION) to grasp the cutting-edge technologies, standards, and industry trends in order to provide and reliable products to clients.
Corporate
KingSpec has strong production abilities. The factory has numbers of automatic SMT production line. Secondly, KingSpec also passed the ISO9001:2015 certificate and all product lines have obtained FCC, CE, RoHS, and REACH certifications.
Strict material and core components quality management is the key factor to help KingSpec building good reputation world-widely. Production process starts with IQC, problem evaluation, mass production OQC, laser defective checking, compatibility tests and harsh environment test. Each step will ensure high quality products go to the end users.
After decades, KingSpec gains numerous business partners across Europe, America and Asia. Especially in Japan, Korea, Vietnam, Brazil and Germany.
KingSpec History
Developed and lunched 2.5 inch SSD product line.
Passed CE, FCC, RoHS certification.
Expanded product line: PCIe, PATA, DOM.
Joined SSD Association.
Estabilished brand stores in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Shenzhen.
Developed SSD with cache solution named “MOTIVE”.
Expanded production area to 1600㎡.
Passed ISO9001:2008 certification.
Grew into mature manufacture who has diversified product line.
Established 15 flagship stores in China,attended more than 15 international exhibitions.
Upgraded brand image.
Released NVMe PCIe Gen 2.
Established new brand “YANSEN” for industry & military.
Established global B2C online sales channel across JD, Tmall, Ali-express, Amazon, Yahoo, Alibaba.
Increasing reputation by winning the “China High tech Enterprise”.
P3 2.5 inch series won the “Recommended product of the year” by ZOL -sience and technology association.
Developed high speed Type-C portable SSD.
Hold mid-year mainland China sales channel assembly.
Enhance brand recognition, release “Dragon” as KingSpec new brand image.
Developed “Q” series SSD for exclusive capacities with SAGE IC design house.
Hold KingSpec annual conference of national agents.
Release new portable SSD line: “Z” series include NVMe &SATA solution.
Developed 4TB capacity for the surveillance market.
Expansion of production scale, adding 3000 square meters of production workshop.
German exhibition.
Expand R&D team
Add new laboratory
On the way......

KingSpec Apresenta as mais recentes soluções de armazenamento e memória para jogos na CES 2024
A Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2024 acontece em Las Vegas, nos EUA, de 9 a 12 de janeiro. Shenzhen KingSpec apresenta soluções de armazenamento e memória de nível industrial e de consumo no estande 52172, no segundo andar do Venice Expo Center.
Sobre a CES
CES é uma exposição líder em tecnologia global que reúne as mais recentes inovações e tendências tecnológicas em todo o mundo. O público está constantemente presente e todos estão ansiosos para conhecer as exposições da exposição e trocar ideias sobre inovação tecnológica. Aqui você pode ampliar seus horizontes.
Destaque de Exposição
Na CES 2024, KingSpec apresentou uma variedade de soluções de armazenamento para consumidores.
SSD-Z5 portátil de alta velocidade
O SSD portátil Z5 possui uma interface USB 3.2 Gen2×2 para uma taxa de transferência rápida de 20 Gbps. Ele varia de 512 GB a 2 TB e está alojado em uma caixa de metal durável com iluminação LED RGB. A interface Type-C garante versatilidade, tornando-o compatível com PCs, laptops e smartphones como as séries Vivo X Fold e Galaxy. Este SSD leve e portátil pode capturar e armazenar a qualquer hora e em qualquer lugar, economizando tempo e esforço.
Legal DDR4 RGB - Prata X
KingSpec lançou o mais recente módulo de memória para jogos DDR4 RGB, Silver X. Este módulo possui uma frequência de até 3600 MHz e capacidade de até 32 GB. O Silver X combina perfeitamente um design prateado sofisticado com recursos robustos e luzes LED RGB legais, prometendo elevar sua experiência de computação a níveis sem precedentes.
Próximo novo lançamento – SSD M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230
Nesta exposição, KingSpec também apresenta nosso próximo novo produto, SSD M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230. Este produto tão aguardado será lançado em breve. Para dar uma espiada e ficar atualizado, visite nosso estande e siga nosso site oficial.
Esperamos encontrar colegas da indústria e entusiastas da tecnologia na exposição para explorarmos juntos os mais recentes desenvolvimentos em tecnologia. Não perca esta oportunidade!
Sobre KingSpec
Fundada em 2007, KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. é uma fornecedora global de soluções de armazenamento e memória. Com marcas como KingSpec e YANSEN aderindo aos padrões de qualidade ISO 9001, oferecemos uma variedade de produtos, incluindo SSDs, DDR RAM, cartões de memória, gabinetes de hub, unidades USB e acessórios de armazenamento. Nossa equipe independente de P&D e capacidade de fabricação nos permitem fornecer soluções de armazenamento personalizadas em todo o mundo, entrando com sucesso nos mercados da Europa, América do Norte e do Sul, Sudeste Asiático, Oriente Médio e Leste Asiático.
